name: YouTube Comments
description: Manage YouTube channel comments â€” scan new comments, generate AI replies, post with approval workflow. Supports multiple identities, dry-run, interactive, and auto modes.

channelId.description: YouTube channel ID to monitor for comments

videoIds.description: Specific video IDs to monitor (overrides maxRecentVideos when set)

maxRecentVideos.description: Number of recent videos to check for comments

maxCommentsPerVideo.description: Maximum comments to fetch per video (max 100)

maxCommentAgeDays.description: Ignore comments older than this many days

minCommentLength.description: Skip comments shorter than this (likely spam or emoji-only)

replyDelayMin.description: Minimum delay (seconds) before posting a reply in auto mode

replyDelayMax.description: Maximum delay (seconds) before posting a reply in auto mode

oauthCredentialsPath.description: Path to Google OAuth client_secret.json file

geminiApiKey.description: Optional Gemini API key for direct reply generation. If not set, uses the OpenClaw connected model.

geminiModel.description: Gemini model to use when geminiApiKey is set

pollIntervalMinutes.description: How often (minutes) the background service checks for new comments. Set 0 to disable.
